field.name: ma_nv
field.check: ma_nv not in (select ma_nv from hrnv)

field.name: noi_kham
field.check: noi_kham <> '' and noi_kham not in (select ma_kcb from hrdmkcb)

field.name: ngay_hl_tu_bhxh
field.check: ngay_hl_tu_bhxh is null and ngay_hl_den_bhxh is not null⩓ngay_hl_tu_bhxh is not null and ngay_hl_den_bhxh is not null and ngay_hl_tu_bhxh > ngay_hl_den_bhxh

field.name: ngay_hl_tu_bhyt
field.check: ngay_hl_tu_bhyt is null and ngay_hl_den_bhyt is not null⩓ngay_hl_tu_bhyt is not null and ngay_hl_den_bhyt is not null and ngay_hl_tu_bhyt > ngay_hl_den_bhyt

field.name: ngay_hl_tu_bhtn
field.check: ngay_hl_tu_bhtn is null and ngay_hl_den_bhtn is not null⩓ngay_hl_tu_bhtn is not null and ngay_hl_den_bhtn is not null and ngay_hl_tu_bhtn > ngay_hl_den_bhtn

field.name: ngay_hl_tu_kpcd
field.check: ngay_hl_tu_kpcd is null and (ngay_hl_den_kpcd is not null or tien <> 0)⩓ngay_hl_tu_kpcd is not null and ngay_hl_den_kpcd is not null and ngay_hl_tu_kpcd > ngay_hl_den_kpcd

field.name: loai_dt
field.check: loai_dt <> '' and loai_dt not in (select ma_loai from hrdmloaidtbh)⩓loai_dt = '' and ngay_hl_tu_dt is not null

field.name: ngay_hl_tu_dt
field.check: loai_dt = '' and ngay_hl_tu_dt is null⩓ngay_hl_tu_dt is not null and ngay_hl_den_dt is not null and ngay_hl_tu_dt > ngay_hl_den_dt

field.name: stt_rec
field.resource: insurance, social, health, unemployment, unionDue, objectType

text.v: Thông tin bảo hiểm, công đoàn
text.e: Employee Insurance and Union Due Information

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @join nvarchar(1023), @field varchar(32) declare @user int, @admin bit, @sys varchar(32), @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int, @count int
select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0
-- Check &Checking;
if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ngay_hl_tu_bhxh', a.stt, '00002' from @@table a join hrnv c on a.ma_nv = c.ma_nv join hrttctxh b on c.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and ((a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is null and b.ngay_hl_den is null) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh < b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh < b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is not null and (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh > b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh > b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <> b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_den > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh and b.ngay_hl_den <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh)) where 1=1&w1;'ngay_hl_tu_bhxh'&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ngay_hl_tu_bhxh', @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join hrnv c on a.ma_nv = c.ma_nv join hrttctxh b on c.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and ((a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is null and b.ngay_hl_den is null) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh < b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh < b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is not null and (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh > b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh > b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh <> b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_den > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh and b.ngay_hl_den <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh)) &Error; end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ngay_hl_tu_bhyt', a.stt, '00002' from @@table a join hrnv c on a.ma_nv = c.ma_nv join hrttctyt b on c.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and ((a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is null) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt < b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt < b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is not null and (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt > b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt > b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_den > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt and b.ngay_hl_den <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt)) where 1=1&w1;'ngay_hl_tu_bhyt'&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ngay_hl_tu_bhyt', @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join hrnv c on a.ma_nv = c.ma_nv join hrttctyt b on c.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and ((a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is null) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt < b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt < b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is not null and (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt > b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt > b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_den > a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt and b.ngay_hl_den <= a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt)) &Error; end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ngay_hl_tu_dt', a.stt, '00002' from @@table a join hrnv c on a.ma_nv = c.ma_nv join hrttctdtbh b on c.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and ((a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_dt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is null) or (a.ngay_hl_den_dt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_dt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt < b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_dt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt < b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_dt is not null and (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_dt and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_dt)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_dt is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt > b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_dt)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_dt is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt > b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_dt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_dt <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_dt and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_dt) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_den > a.ngay_hl_tu_dt and b.ngay_hl_den <= a.ngay_hl_den_dt)) where 1=1&w1;'ngay_hl_tu_dt'&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ngay_hl_tu_dt', @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join hrnv c on a.ma_nv = c.ma_nv join hrttctdtbh b on c.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and ((a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_dt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is null) or (a.ngay_hl_den_dt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_dt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt < b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <= b.ngay_hl_den)) or (a.ngay_hl_den_dt is null and b.ngay_hl_den is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt < b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_dt is not null and (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_dt and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_dt)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_dt is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt > b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_dt)) or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den_dt is not null and (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt > b.ngay_hl_tu)) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_dt > b.ngay_hl_tu and a.ngay_hl_den_dt <= b.ngay_hl_den) or (b.ngay_hl_tu > a.ngay_hl_tu_dt and b.ngay_hl_tu <= a.ngay_hl_den_dt) or (a.ngay_hl_tu_dt <> b.ngay_hl_tu and b.ngay_hl_den > a.ngay_hl_tu_dt and b.ngay_hl_den <= a.ngay_hl_den_dt)) &Error; end &EndErrorMode;
if @admin = 0 begin exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' where (' + @key + ')' end end
-- Gather create table #r (stt_rec char(13), ma_so_bhxh varchar(32), ma_so_hgd varchar(32), si_no varchar(32), si_date smalldatetime, si_date2 smalldatetime, hi_no varchar(32), hi_date smalldatetime, hi_date2 smalldatetime, noi_kham varchar(32), quyen_loi nvarchar(256), ngay_hl_tu_bhxh smalldatetime, ngay_hl_den_bhxh smalldatetime, ngay_hl_tu_bhyt smalldatetime, ngay_hl_den_bhyt smalldatetime, ngay_hl_tu_bhtn smalldatetime, ngay_hl_den_bhtn smalldatetime, ngay_hl_tu_kpcd smalldatetime, ngay_hl_den_kpcd smalldatetime, tien decimal(20, 5), loai_dt varchar(8), ngay_hl_tu_dt smalldatetime, ngay_hl_den_dt smalldatetime, dien_giai nvarchar(256))
select top 0 cast('' as varchar(32)) as xkey, cast('' as varchar(32)) as xtable, stt_rec, cast('' as char(3)) as stt_rec0, ngay_hl_tu_bhxh as ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den_bhxh as ngay_hl_den, tien, loai_dt, cast(null as nvarchar(256)) as dien_giai, cast(0 as tinyint) as stt into #d from #r
set @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, a.ma_so_bhxh, a.ma_so_hgd, a.si_no, si_date, a.si_date2, a.hi_no, a.hi_date, a.hi_date2,' set @q = @q + 'a.noi_kham, a.quyen_loi, a.ngay_hl_tu_bhxh, a.ngay_hl_den_bhxh, a.ngay_hl_tu_bhyt, a.ngay_hl_den_bhyt,' set @q = @q + 'a.ngay_hl_tu_bhtn, a.ngay_hl_den_bhtn, a.ngay_hl_tu_kpcd, a.ngay_hl_den_kpcd, a.tien, a.loai_dt, a.ngay_hl_tu_dt, a.ngay_hl_den_dt, a.dien_giai' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv' + @key exec sp_executesql @q
insert into #d select '', 'hrttctxh', stt_rec, '', ngay_hl_tu_bhxh, ngay_hl_den_bhxh, 0, '', '', 0 from #r where ngay_hl_tu_bhxh is not null insert into #d select '', 'hrttctyt', stt_rec, '', ngay_hl_tu_bhyt, ngay_hl_den_bhyt, 0, '', '', 0 from #r where ngay_hl_tu_bhyt is not null insert into #d select '', 'hrttcttn', stt_rec, '', ngay_hl_tu_bhtn, ngay_hl_den_bhtn, 0, '', '', 0 from #r where ngay_hl_tu_bhtn is not null insert into #d select '', 'hrttctcd', stt_rec, '', ngay_hl_tu_kpcd, ngay_hl_den_kpcd, tien, '', '', 0 from #r where ngay_hl_tu_kpcd is not null insert into #d select '', 'hrttctdtbh', stt_rec, '', ngay_hl_tu_dt, ngay_hl_den_dt, tien, loai_dt, dien_giai, 0 from #r where ngay_hl_tu_dt is not null
-- Delete if @type = '0' begin delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from hrttbh b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec) delete #d from #d a where exists(select 1 from hrttctxh b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctxh') delete #d from #d a where exists(select 1 from hrttctyt b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctyt') delete #d from #d a where exists(select 1 from hrttcttn b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttcttn') delete #d from #d a where exists(select 1 from hrttctcd b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctcd') delete #d from #d a where exists(select 1 from hrttctdtbh b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctdtbh') end
select b.stt_rec, a.ma_so_bhxh, a.ma_so_hgd, a.si_no, a.si_date, a.si_date2, a.hi_no, a.hi_date, a.hi_date2, a.noi_kham, a.quyen_loi into #k from #r a join hrttbh b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec)
select b.stt_rec, b.stt_rec0, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den into #d1 from #d a join hrttctxh b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctxh' select b.stt_rec, b.stt_rec0, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den into #d2 from #d a join hrttctyt b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctyt' select b.stt_rec, b.stt_rec0, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den into #d3 from #d a join hrttcttn b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttcttn' select b.stt_rec, b.stt_rec0, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den, a.tien into #d4 from #d a join hrttctcd b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctcd' select b.stt_rec, b.stt_rec0, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den, a.loai_dt, a.dien_giai into #d5 from #d a join hrttctdtbh b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctdtbh'
delete #d from #d a where exists(select 1 from #d1 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctxh') delete #d from #d a where exists(select 1 from #d2 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctyt') delete #d from #d a where exists(select 1 from #d3 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttcttn') delete #d from #d a where exists(select 1 from #d4 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctcd') delete #d from #d a where exists(select 1 from #d5 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and a.xtable = 'hrttctdtbh') if @type = '1' &ListWhenBeforeImportUpdateLog; --Insert @@inserting(insurance);
select @count = count(*) from #d if @count > 0 begin update #d set xkey = xtable + stt_rec create table #stt(xtable varchar(32), stt_rec char(13), stt_rec0 char(3)) create table #o1(xgroup varchar(32), ngay_hl smalldatetime, stt int not null identity (1, 1))
insert into #stt select 'hrttctxh', b.stt_rec, max(b.stt_rec0) from #d a join hrttctxh b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec insert into #stt select 'hrttctyt', b.stt_rec, max(b.stt_rec0) from #d a join hrttctyt b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec insert into #stt select 'hrttcttn', b.stt_rec, max(b.stt_rec0) from #d a join hrttcttn b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec insert into #stt select 'hrttctcd', b.stt_rec, max(b.stt_rec0) from #d a join hrttctcd b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec insert into #stt select 'hrttctdtbh', b.stt_rec, max(b.stt_rec0) from #d a join hrttctdtbh b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec
insert into #o1(xgroup, ngay_hl) select xgroup, ngay_hl from (select xkey as xgroup, ngay_hl_tu as ngay_hl from #d union select distinct xkey as xgroup, null from #d) a order by xgroup, ngay_hl
select stt, xgroup into #o2 from #o1 where ngay_hl is null
update #d set stt = b.stt + cast(isnull(c.stt_rec0, 0) as int) from #d a left join (select c.stt - d.stt as stt, c.xgroup, c.ngay_hl from #o1 c join #o2 d on c.xgroup = d.xgroup) b on a.xkey = b.xgroup and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl left join #stt c on a.stt_rec = c.stt_rec and a.xtable = c.xtable
@@inserting(social); where rtrim(xtable) = 'hrttctxh' @@inserting(health); where rtrim(xtable) = 'hrttctyt' @@inserting(unemployment); where rtrim(xtable) = 'hrttcttn' @@inserting(unionDue); where rtrim(xtable) = 'hrttctcd' @@inserting(objectType); where rtrim(xtable) = 'hrttctdtbh' end
-- Update if @type = 1 begin update hrttbh set @@list(insurance); from hrttbh a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec update hrttctxh set @@list(social); from hrttctxh a join #d1 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0 update hrttctyt set @@list(health); from hrttctyt a join #d2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0 update hrttcttn set @@list(unemployment); from hrttcttn a join #d3 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0 update hrttctcd set @@list(unionDue); from hrttctcd a join #d4 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0 update hrttctdtbh set @@list(objectType); from hrttctdtbh a join #d5 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0 end
